personalInfo.name: Belgareg Mohamed Amine
personalInfo.title: Data Analyst || Business Intelligence Developer || web developer
personalInfo.bio: Passionate about transforming data into actionable insights and creating impactful web solutions. With expertise in business intelligence, web development, and graphic design, I bring a unique blend of analytical and creative skills to every project.

education.institution: Higher Institute of Technological Studies of Rades
education.description: During this program, I developed a solid expertise in Business Intelligence and data analysis, becoming proficient with key tools such as Power BI, MS BI, SQL Server, SSPS, Python, R  and Excel. I also acquired skills in project management, data warehousing, and database management. This experience allowed me to enhance my teamwork skills and refine my abilities in management, economics, and personal development.
Focus on software engineering and database management. Graduated with First Class Honours.
Mathematics and Computer Science focus. Graduated with distinction.

experience.description: Lead data analyst for client projects, specializing in business intelligence and predictive analytics.
Full-stack development intern working on client websites and internal tools.

volunteer.description: Mentoring young women in programming and data science
Leading monthly workshops on data analysis and visualization
